pages.text: <li>Converts solid items into <l>(misc/resources#mutagen)Mutagen</l><li>the gauge on the left is the internal power storage<li>the gauge on the right is internal mutagen tank<li>items can be inserted from every side<li>mutagen will be automatically outputted to any nearby pipe or tank
Can process redstone, glowstone and various kinds of uranium and radioactive material.
